import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Location } from '@angular/common'; @Component({ selector: 'app-projects', templateUrl: './projects.component.html', styleUrls: ['./projects.component.scss'] }) export class ProjectsComponent { constructor(private location: Location) {} goBack(): void { this.location.back(); } }

My Projects

Audio to Text Application

An application that converts audio files to text using AssemblyAI's transcription API.

Live

Parking Management System

A web-based parking management system built with the MEAN stack.

Under Development Live

Job Portal

A MEAN stack-based job portal allowing employers to post jobs and candidates to apply.

Under Development Live

Box Rent Application

An online platform for renting and managing storage boxes with secure access.

Under Development Live
